SongLyrics.JpnStr: 間違[まちが]い探[さが]しの夜[よ]更[ふ]かし あら楽[たの]しい
SongLyrics.EngStr: Up late playing spot the difference. Oh, how fun

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 迷[まよ]い子[こ]が手[て]招[まね]く 夢[ゆめ]の国[くに]へ
SongLyrics.EngStr: A lost child beckons me to the land of dreams

SongLyrics.JpnStr: アッチはソッチ? コッチはドッチ?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Over there? Or over here?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 電池[でんち]切[き]れ人生[じんせい] たちまち Let's パーティー
SongLyrics.EngStr: My life's low on battery, but for now, Let's party

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 博愛[はくあい]主義[しゅぎ]の皆々様[みなみなさま] ご立[りっ]派[ぱ]なことです
SongLyrics.EngStr: You're all a bunch of philanthropists, how very admirable

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ぐるぐるぐる 踊[おど]りましょう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Round and round and round. Let's dance

SongLyrics.JpnStr: べたべたべた 蔓延[はびこ]るの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Stickiness spreading throughout

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嘘[うそ]だらけ塗[ぬ]ったトースト お一[ひと]つ如何[いかが]?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Toast covered in lies. How about one?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ワタシダケユウレイ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm the only ghost here

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 掻[か]き鳴[な]らした音[おと]は 心地[ここち]悪[わる]いね
SongLyrics.EngStr: The sound you're strumming out feels bad, man

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 搾[しぼ]り出[だ]せ 頭[あたま]の中[なか]全[ぜん]部[ぶ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: C'mon and squeeze out everything inside your head

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 完全[かんぜん]主義[しゅぎ]の皆々様[みなみなさま] 右脳[うのう]が死[し]んでます?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Dear perfectionists, is the right side of your brain dead?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆら 遊[あそ]びましょう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Sway, sway, sway. Let's play

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どろどろどろ 吐[は]き出[だ]すの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like sludge, let's spit it out

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 錆[さび]だらけ塗[ぬ]ったトースト 代[か]わりに如何[いかが]?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Toast covered in rust. How about seconds?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ダレデスカユウレイ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Who is the ghost now?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 空[から]っぽの部屋[へや]で 光[ひかり]は邪魔[じゃま]だね 煙[けむり]の中[なか]でさえ
SongLyrics.EngStr: In an empty room, light is a nuisance, even in the smoke

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 憂鬱[ゆううつ]は飲[の]み干[ほ]せ 毒[どく]が抜[ぬ]けるまで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Drink up the melancholy until the poison is gone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 後[うし]ろの正面[まえ] 誰[だれ]?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Who's that behind me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: わたしの顔[かお]が見[み]えた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I saw my own face

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嘘[うそ]だらけ塗[ぬ]ったトースト 一緒[いっしょ]に如何[いかが]?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ぐちゃぐちゃぐちゃ 笑[わら]いましょう

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ぞくぞくぞく 歪[ゆが]めましょう

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 錆[さび]だらけ塗[ぬ]ったトースト もう一[ひと]つ如何[いかが]?
